alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:54PM EDT until March 31 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sullivan County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 354 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lincoln Falls, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Laporte, Kettle Creek Gorge, Lincoln Falls, Shunk, Dushore, Forksville, Eagles Mere and Hillsgrove. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
